text: All right. I expect you all to have fun.
But be careful. I want to see you all back here in September.
Yes, ma'am!
[Giggle]
Summer vacation...
The best time of the year!
What are we doing here? I thought you wanted to have a meeting.
I called a meeting because I've been thinking about this for months
and I've come up with the most awesome summer vacation ever!
We get a real summer vacation?
Won't we be training all summer?
Yes!
That's the beauty of it! Oh, wait till you hear this!
We're going on a Priestess Club retreat to the beach.
I got a bunch of brochures for different places, so we just have to choose.
Look at these!
Yuzu, you're the best ever!
I can't wait for the beach!
I'll be out there every day and I'll get some hot guy to teach me how to surf!
I'll be able to pick up alien transmissions from distant planets!
Not gonna happen.
[Nervous chuckle]
Oh, come on, you guys.
We've been working so hard fighting demons.
We all need a break and it's summer vacation!
We'll swim! And we'll surf!
And we'll just have fun until we drop!
I'm so in! Okay, where are we going?!
I really wanna go somewhere where there's a spa!
There should be tennis courts and a stable with horses!
Hey, we can't afford all that stuff!
Hey, you didn't tell Izumi we couldn't afford a spa!
- Everyone wants to go to a spa. - I don't want to go to one!
You guys.
It won't help us any to argue over the brochures.
Why don't we go back to my house?
We can plan our retreat there.
Yeah, great idea! Your house is so much fun!
Yeah, right. Her house isn't any fun.
You just want that cake again.
That cake was something special.
They don't make that cake anywhere else, you know.
Would you shut up about the cake already?
But it's so good. It's the best ever.
[Awed gasp]
Ohhh...
Oooo...
This place is so amazing.
Do you know how big it is?
No, I've never counted the rooms or anything.
But... who cares how many rooms there are?
I care! I wanna know!
This is the small sitting room.
[Awed gasp]
Wow!
This is totally different than last time.
This one looks like a room in Versailles.
Someone on the web would probably buy that.
All right. We have to decide where to go
and how to get there and where we'll stay.
I know that, but just sitting here, I...
This house is so beautiful! Nothing's going to be as nice as here!
I don't want to go anywhere!
I want to stay here for the entire summer!
I don't want to go anywhere anymore!
I think I know what she means.
But what are we going to do? We can't stay here.
Oh, wait! I have an idea.
We had a little house on the beach a few years ago.
My parents might still own it.
Beach house?
I mean, it's not as nice or as big as this place,
but if you guys wouldn't mind roughing it a little...
[Happy gasp]
Yeah, that sounds perfect!
The perfect place for our awesome summer!
Okay, I'm in!
Me too! Me too!
- Yeah, me too! - Mm-hmm.
- Oh, that would be great. - I need a new bathing suit. Mine sucks!
At her house, we'll be able to cook!
Okay, girls, we have a plan.
We're gonna have the most awesome summer ever!
A Priestess Club summer retreat?
Yeah!
Because it's Shizuka's family's house, it
won't cost us anything and it'll be safe!
And I promise you that we'll train every day while we're there, I swear!
So can we go, Kurako, please, can we?
It sounds fine.
I think it will be a perfect opportunity to strengthen the bonds between you.
Really? It's okay?!
We can go?!
A summer on the beach! This is gonna be awesome!
All summer?
It sounds like you're gonna have an awful lot of fun.
Oh. Hey, Tama, you wanna come with us?
Really? I can come, too?!
Yay! The beach! The beach!
All right! I'm gonna try to swim my butt off!
Now remember, girls, in the summer on the beach,
it's easy to let your guard down and lose all- lose all discipline.
Just be careful about who you talk to and where you go. Understand?
Oh, Dad. It may be a retreat,
but it will also be an opportunity to focus on their training.
I'll make sure they stick to a rigorous schedule.
Huh?
Since I'm in charge of the Priestess Club,
I will be perfectly happy to chaperone for you.
What?! Uh... You're coming with us?
Of course. I'll work out a training schedule
to whip you all into shape this summer.
Huh?!
Aww...
Uh...
I need a new top and shorts.
We'll need bathing suits.
[Excited squeal]
Let's go shopping!
[Excited laughter]
[Giggling]
Wow! Look at all the bathing suits!
[Happy laughter]
Hey, Tama!
What about this one? Do you like it?
Wow, it's so cute!
Why don't you try it on?
It's so cute!
I just have to buy one, too!
[Giggling]
[Laughter]
[Happy laughter]
Chika, I found the perfect thing for you!
You'd look so cute in it!
Dork.
[Embarassed giggle]
Oh, you'd look so cute!
We'll see you at the end of the summer.
Bye, Daddy! Bye, Hiro!
We'll bring you back a lot of presents, I promise!
Have a good time! Don't talk to any strange boys!
Make that all boys!
Huh?
[Uncomfortable throat-clearing]
Hey, everyone, look over here!
I can see the ocean! It's right over there!
Huh?
Oh, let me look! I wanna see!
I can smell the ocean. We're almost there!
The white sand beaches, the endless blue water...
Grilled corn on the beach and Italian ices!
I'm going to have so much fun!
Ahem...
Oh, I meant train really hard...
On to the first ever annual Priestess Club Summer Retreat!
Yay!
Oh, uh, Hiro...
Uh, the soy sauce...
Oh, uh... Here.
[Wind chime rings]
[Sleepy yawn]
